Text.Page:
The naga {@LinkCreature:31#20#deathreapers} and {@LinkCreature:31#21#colossi} have no fear. They'll walk right into our camps if they get the chance. Eliminate them and bring back their helmets as proof.

Report to Leuwra when you're done.
Great job! Things will be a bit quieter now that there are fewer nagas to storm around the camps.
I'm only giving rewards if I see proof.
